I frequently order from TAMALITO. Food has been  great all this time. Until recently, I stopped by for take out and decided to have a shot of tequila reposado. It was triple the average price. And it's not in SOHO. Not a good way to keep customers.
Si se equivocan con el pedido, los van a culpar a ustedes cuando vayan a reclamar.... descaradisimos, pesimo lugar!!
Food is always so good. Tacos Al pastor, de carnitas. As well as the nachos and burritos de bistec. Their agua de horchata is delicious never misses.
Really good and tasty. One of the very few good mexican food places in the area in my opinion. Friendly service. I mainly order for take out and food is ready within 15-20mins.
I love Burritos. This place makes really good burritos. I had it the first time and I was hooked I can't go too long without my burrito fix from El TAMALITO ‚úåüèª
